Class Filters.GrayscaleFilter

java.lang.Object
squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.Filters.GrayscaleFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:

Filters
public static class Filters.GrayscaleFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements squidpony.IFilter<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>
An IFilter that converts all colors passed to it to grayscale, like a black and white film.
